description:
Ryuuga is the elder brother of Yuria and the successor of the Taizan Tenrouken "Mt. Tai Celestial Wolf Fist" style, which allows him to scoop the chunks of his enemies` flesh while leaving them with a feeling of coldness. He represents the solitary star of Sirius (The Heavenly Wolf Star), which is neither, part of the Hokuto nor Nantou constellations. After the nuclear war, Ryuuga pledges his loyalty to Raou, believing that his tyranny will restore order to the world. However, he begins to doubt Raou`s methods when he meets his sister`s fianc√©e Kenshirou, the other Hokuto Shinken master.
Ryuuga decides to challenge Kenshirou by kidnapping Toki and keeping him captive in his castle. Kenshirou defeats him, only to find out that Ryuuga was already dying, having slit his own stomach before the battle.
name: Ryuuga
